sentences.sContent: The boy picked up a handful of stones and started throwing them at us.
sentences.sCn: 那男孩捡起一把石子，开始朝我们扔过来。

sentences.sContent: He surveyed the handful of customers at the bar.
sentences.sCn: 他打量着吧台边仅有的几位顾客。

phrases.pCn: 少数的人；少量的几个人

trans.tranOther: an amount that you can hold in your hand
